original_text: And Aaron took as Moses commanded, and ran into the midst of the congregation; and, behold, the plague was begun among the people: and he put on incense, and made an atonement for the people.
korean_text: 아론이 모세의 명령을 따라 향로를 가지고 회중에게로 달려간즉 백성 중에 염병이 시작되었는지라 이에 백성을 위하여 속죄하고

sentences.original_text: And Aaron took as Moses commanded
and ran into the midst of the congregation
and, behold, the plague was begun among the people
and made an atonement for the people
